channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21698] TezSessionState#ensureLocalResources() causes IndexOutOfBoundsException while localizing resources
item.description:
The cause of exception is due to this loops over newFilesNotFromConf and tries to access newResources.get in that.

Size of newResources is determined by utils.localizeTempFiles() here which may return a smaller list depending upon the skipFilesFromConf and this would result in newResources.size() < newFilesNotFromConf.length causing IndexOutOfBounds.
item.summary: TezSessionState#ensureLocalResources() causes IndexOutOfBoundsException while localizing resources

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12978365 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

nareshpr
DAGUtils.localizeTempFiles can return null. But the caller TezSessionState.ensureLocalResources doesn't validate it before using it. Please add the check.
